section.title: mda Tracker
section.para: A port of mda's pitch tracking plug-in.

This plug-in tracks the frequency of the input signal with an oscillator, ring modulator or filter. The pitch tracking only works with monophonic inputs, but can create interesting effects on unpitched sounds such as drums.

This plug can be used with white or pink noise inputs to generate random pitch sequences. Interesting evolving soundscapes can be made with a drum loop input and Tracker, RezFilter and Delay in series.

entry.para: Apply dynamics of input signal to generated output.
Pitch offset to create harmonics, octave doubling, etc.
Maximum allowed pitch - to supress pitch tracking errors.
Threshold level for pitch tracker - raise to stop tracking in gaps.
